CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL( Report_Formatting__c , 'Template A'), HYPERLINK("https://gotosage.lightning.force.com/lightning/r/Report/00O3i000002gXyYEAU/view??fv0="+Name , "Open Report") , IF(ISPICKVAL( Report_Formatting__c , 'Template B'), HYPERLINK("https://gotosage.lightning.force.com/lightning/r/Report/00O3i000002gXyZEAU/view?fv0="+Name , "Open Report") , 'No Link' ) )
CustomField.label: Report URL
